name: Midnight Slash
description:
Play in fullscreen!

You are the samurai. You must survive this midnight against an monsters .

Control:

Tap on screen, samurai will move that way, destroying all monsters on his way,  BUT no more then 3 at the time.

Game was develop by this persons:

  • Yana Trishina - 2D artist
  • Dmitry Makarov -  Game developer,
  • Egor Parfenov - Game designer, Game developer,
  • Kirill Shutov - Game designer, Game developer,

Each of us spent less then 3 hour.
